title: Gothic Art - Visions and Revelations of the Medieval World (Art
description:
Gothic Art: Visions and Revelations of the Medieval World By Michael Camille
1996 | 192 Pages | ISBN: 0297833723 | scanned PDF | 258 MB

Continuing the tradition of the Everyman Art Series,combining learned yet livelytext by acknowledged scholars in the field with high quality illustrations in colour throughout.

From its inception in the mid-12th century, Gothic art was linked to changing notions of time, space and light, to a reorganization of perception. Sight replaced hearing as the most elevated of the senses. This text explores Gothic art as a highly-innovative form, encompassing new world models.
